titles.title: A resolution recognizing the contributions of health care professionals during the 2020 Coronavirus pandemic.
A resolution recognizing the contributions of health care professionals during the 2020 Coronavirus pandemic.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary: This resolution salutes health care professionals and expresses gratitude to the people of the United States for doing their part to stop the spread of COVID-19 (i.e., coronavirus disease 2019).
